name: Hyperdrive (Valkija)
description:
Hyperdrive is a fast-paced driving game in a neon/cyberpunk style. Dodge traffic, hit boosts and perform near-misses to increase your combo meter, competing to get the high score on your machine's local leader-board. 

Created as part of a 2-week game jam for my university course, Hyperdrive includes open source sound files from freesound.org and music from various artists. All other assets and code is created by me!

Please bear in mind this project is a prototype only! Game play and content is rather bare-bones. The game has been a learning experience for me, and I both welcome and appreciate any feedback given in comments.
